climatePledgeFriendly.details: Compact by Design (Certified by Amazon) products remove excess air and water, which reduces the carbon footprint of shipping and packaging.

features: Natural & Hypoallergenic: Our laundry detergent sheets are made from plant-based ingredients, no phosphorus, no bleach and no dyes, offering a natural and eco-friendly cleaning solution. The hypoallergenic formula making them safe and gentle on all skin types, even for those with sensitivities.

Ultra-Concentrated Cleaning: Experience the cleaning power of ultra-concentration with each sheet. Each laundry detergent sheet is formulated with deep cleaning ingredients to easily remove tough stains including juice, oil, Sauce and dirt. These detergent sheets dissolve quickly, leaving your laundry fresh and spotless without any harm to the fabrics.

Eco-Friendly & Septic-Free: LAUNDRYLUX are dedicated to fostering a sustainable, green Earth environment. We place a strong emphasis on environmental responsibility by opting for packaging that is both plastic-free and recyclable. No more plastic jug! Besides, these laundry detergent sheets are specifically formulated to be safe for septic systems, making them a reliable choice for home use.

Space-Saving & Travel-Ready: Our laundry detergent strips are incredibly compact and lightweight, making them a breeze to carry when you're on the go, whether for travel, outdoor adventures, or everyday convenience.

Lasting Freshness & Zero Mess: Our laundry detergent sheets dissolve easily in both warm and cold water. It works for all machines, HE included. No more measuring, spilling, or mess. 1 sheet= 2 strips= 2 loads, ensuring a hassle-free and enjoyable laundry experience. Enjoy the long-lasting freshness of our detergent sheets with a pleasing scent.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Why Choose LAUNDRYLUX Laundry Detergent Sheets? Discover our laundry detergent sheets with a powerful cleaning feature that effortlessly fights tough stains, removes stubborn dirt, and leaves your clothes fresh and renewed. Just toss it in with your laundry for a simple and effective cleaning solution.

No Mess& Zero Waste Our laundry detergent sheets bring you the ultimate in eco-friendliness with its zero-waste and no-mess features. Each one is designed for a single use, reducing plastic waste and mess. Just grab a sheet, add it to your laundry, and watch it dissolve without a trace. It's the simplest and cleanest way to care for your clothes and the planet.

For All Machines Our laundry detergent sheets dissolve easily in both warm and cold water. It works for all machines, HE included. Easy to Use No more measuring, spilling, or mess. 1 sheet= 2 strips= 2 loads, ensuring a hassle-free and enjoyable laundry experience. Space-Saving & Travel-Ready Our laundry detergent sheets are super compact, perfect for small storage areas, and ideal for anyone on the go. Whether you're a frequent traveler or just want to save space at home, these sheets are your effortless laundry solution.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 8, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I love the laundry sheets! They are very effective at cleaning all kinds of laundry. You just use as much or little of a sheet that you need. For a very big or dirty load, I use a sheet and a half. It's easy to modify just as with liquid detergent. The scent is very mild. I love not storing and dragging around the big detergent jugs! So glad big changes are coming for modern laundry needs! I use fabric softeners as I would with regular detergents and so far still use wool lite black for dark clothes. This is a wonderful product for modern families!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 8, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars They are just alright.
reviews.reviewText: They get the laundry clean enough, I guess. I haven’t really noticed a difference between them and the other detergent I was using except for the smell. There is minimal smell when you open the package that disappears after it’s been open a few days. My laundry doesn’t smell great when I open the door after it’s finished washing. But seems clean? Overall, it seems to clean. I just wished it smelled clean as well. But, it’s hard to find a natural detergent with smell that isn’t toxic. Essential oils on dryer balls has helped enhance the clean laundry smell

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 1, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I was really impressed with these. They are so thin and small I really didn't think they would properly clean my clothes but they did!! I even did several tests with these to see how well they would clean. Too my surprise each test I did the clothes came out clean. I have been telling everyone about these. They are great for the environment, and they really do an amazing job!!! I wish I could give 10 stars!!!!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 10, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Easy to use
reviews.reviewText: These work great and smell great. I love the compact box which is easy to dispose of and not plastic! 🌎

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 2, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Worth it they work great!
reviews.reviewText: I ha e a teenage son and was worried these would clean his sink clothes. They do! I use 1.5 sheets for his laundry and 1 for all my other laundry. They are a great price and I love that I'm not adding plastic to the dump.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 12, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I like the fact that it doesn't have any sent to it 😁👍

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 8, 2024
reviews.reviewText: We like it very much. The packaging is unique and the laundry gets clean;It is especially good for our pets bedding!, ...as he has allergies to other detergents.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 29, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I guess they're okay? They smell really nice. But I don't see any suds so I have no idea if it's actually doing anything. It is convenient to just toss in a sheet though. The packaging is horrible though. I don't get who designed the packaging. One long box with two packages within. Why didn't they just put the two packages on top of each other inside a smaller container? Or just put it all into one container? Waste. Given the choice I would not buy these again and go for a known brand. Because I just don't see any suds and the clothes come out smelling normal. I even used one full sheet for a small to medium size load and the clothes had no scent after washing. I don't want a huge scent of course, but I would like them to smell like something.
